title: CoD: WWII – rip or repack?
body:
As you could see by the posted size, I’ve already compressed the singleplayer part of CoD: WWII for ten languages. But I also have all “Nazi Zombies” and multiplayer files sitting on my disk. The thing is, that those are completely useless now – no crack available for them to play in single-mode alone or with bots. And there is no guarantee that such crack will ever appear.

So, here’s the dilemma: should I post SP-rip today (and an updated full repack some day, only if/when MP/ZM will be playable) or prepare the full repack with all files, but release it tomorrow?
